In a message dated 4/14/2004 12:13:22 PM Eastern Standard Time, 
spiritus_saitou@... writes:
Forwarding this message just in case anyone's interested in helping get RK 
back onto the program schedule of Cartoon Network.  They've cut it up so badly, 
I'd like to see them just put it back into the primetime Toonami schedule 
(which is how I first started watching it).
I'm wondering if this is even a permanent thing though. They never showed the 
Kyoto arc but once. Maybe they intend to move it around later? Include it in 
the Adult Swim line-up at some point? They do that sort of thing all the time 
with their other anime. I wouldn't be a bit surprised to see it turn up again 
soon anyway. I finally gave up on them myself. I'm slowing gather
